urls.description: Webinar, 21 September 2021, 10.30-11.30 CEST Leading telecom associations GSMA and ETNO organize an online webinar for the launch of Europe‚Äôs first ‚Äú5G guide for local communities‚Äù. Taking place on 21 September 2021, from 10.30 to 11.30 CEST, the webinar will address o pportunities, safety limits and myths related to the latest generation of mobile technology. Which socio-economic opportunities for European cities and regions? What is the science on 5G and its safety? How can local authorities facilitate
